effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
